Rowdy Wolf:




Rowdy Wolf aimed his rifle at Kitkat, keeping his eyes focused on the site. 
After he heard her speak of Quickstrike, he lifted his head. "Quickstrike?" 
he said. "Then he made it back. Why did he send you all the way here?"
